content.html: Ok hot take: How was it the Infinity Saga? They had a billionnaire in a robot suit, a Norse god, an enhanced super soldier, a wizard, a group of space vigilantes, a teenager with spider powers, a man with ant powers, and a king powerex by vibranium. See how ridiculous you sound?
content.value: Ok hot take: How was it the Infinity Saga? They had a billionnaire in a robot suit, a Norse god, an enhanced super soldier, a wizard, a group of space vigilantes, a teenager with spider powers, a man with ant powers, and a king powerex by vibranium. See how ridiculous you sound?
